title: Phil Robertson's Double-Date Plans Might Just Leave You Stunned
description:
If you think you know Phil Robertson, prepare to be shocked. Mac Owen, one of the original Duckmen (and John-David's uncle), reveals what it was like to go out on the town with Phil and Miss Kay back in the day, and Martin, Stone, and John-David are blown away. Uncle Si talks about his beloved hunting trenchcoat and cracks everyone up with wild deer-hunting stories. Mac remembers insulting Phil's blind-building skills, life as Phil's first business partner, close calls in the woods, and Phil's questionable advice about deodorant. And the boys get letters from Duck Call Room's youngest guests, Leia and Sawyer.
-
